profile.title: Bayanan Mai amfani
profile.mustLogin: Dole ne ka shiga kafin ka ga saituna.
profile.filterExplicit: Tace abun da bai dace ba
profile.allowExplicitContent: Bada damar abun da bai dace ba
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Daƙiƙu kafin a goge kai tsaye
profile.saveError: Kuskure: ba a iya ajiye saituna ba
profile.noPrivateKey: Babu mabuɗin sirri a wannan na'ura da za a fitar.
profile.setBackupPassword: Saita kalmar sirri don ɓoye madadin:
profile.backupDownloaded: An sauke madadin da aka ɓoye.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Shigar da kalmar sirri don wannan madadin:
profile.importSuccess: An shigo da mabuɗin sirri zuwa wannan na'ura.
profile.importFailed: An kasa shigo da mabuɗin (kalmar sirri ba daidai ba ko fayil ɗin ya lalace).
profile.keysRotated: An ƙirƙiri sabbin maɓallan kuma an ɗora mabuɗin jama'a.
profile.importKey: Shigo da madadin mabuɗin da aka ɓoye
profile.keyDisclaimer: Mabuɗinka na sirri baya barin wannan na'ura. Fitar da kwafin da aka kare da kalmar sirri domin dawo da shi akan wata na'ura.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Mika kira da saƙonnin da ke shigowa zuwa lambar wayarka ko imel ɗinka da aka tabbatar. Kiran fita/saƙonni za su nuna lambar Chatforia naka.

chat.selectPrompt: Zaɓi saƙo ko ɗakin hira don fara hira
